backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profiles, daily reps/set stats, daily goals, and permission-checked queries and updates using AccessControl.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file including components, hooks, views, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme definitions using OKLCH color tokens with light/dark mode variables and global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining root element and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, query client, theme provider, and Internet Identity provider, defining Counter and Stats routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting first‑time authenticated users to enter and save their name via backend profile APIs.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout with header navigation, login button, profile setup dialog, routed content, and footer branding.
frontend/src/features/counter/CounterScr: Main pull-up counter UI that manages reps, daily goals, and logging sets with support for authenticated and local storage modes.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetSessi: Confirmation dialog for resetting the current set rep counter to zero.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetToday: Confirmation dialog for resetting today's total reps and sets.
Empty placeholder file for a rest timer component.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalDa: Hook that stores and retrieves the user's daily goal in localStorage with date rollover handling.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalTo: Hook that tracks today's reps and sets in localStorage and updates on date rollover.
frontend/src/features/counter/useWorkout: Empty placeholder file for workout session logic.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryLis: Empty placeholder file for viewing workout history.
frontend/src/features/history/SessionDet: Empty placeholder file for viewing details of a specific workout session.
frontend/src/features/stats/StatsView.ts: Displays daily and historical stats, choosing between backend and local data depending on authentication.
frontend/src/features/stats/useUserStats: Empty placeholder file for user stats hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication via Internet Identity, managing identity state, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user stats, goals, and profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a full set of CSS variables for light/dark themes, applying global background, foreground, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and an Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/dayStamp.ts: Provides helpers to convert dates and date strings into bigint day-stamp identifiers and retrieve today's stamp or date string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, clearing, and syncing URL parameters with sessionStorage, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, typography, animations, container settings, and extended theme values tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, architecture notes, known issues, and current scope for a pull‑up counter app.
